subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Alex Ruoff scored 18 points and West Virginia made up for a lack of experience by taking a big lead and holding on for a 70-65 victory against No. 2 U.C.L.A. yesterday in Morgantown, W.Va.
snippet: Alex Ruoff scored 18 points and West Virginia made up for a lack of experience by taking a big lead and holding on for a 70-65 victory against No. 2 U.C.L.A. yesterday in Morgantown, W.Va.
